scripts.build:vendors-react:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production                                   browserify                                                              -r react -r react-dom                                                                              -g [ loose-envify purge --NODE_ENV production ] -g uglifyify -p bundle-collapser/plugin | uglifyjs --compress=unused,dead_code --mangle -o build/dist/vendors/react.min.js
scripts.build:dev-box-ui-react-components:dist:p: cross-env NODE_ENV=production                browserify   -r ./src/lib/react-components/:dev-box-ui-react-components -x react -x react-dom                                                                              -g [ loose-envify purge --NODE_ENV production ] -g uglifyify -p bundle-collapser/plugin | uglifyjs --compress=unused,dead_code --mangle -o build/dist/dev-box-ui/react-components.min.js
scripts.build:dev-box-ui-web-components:dist:pro: cross-env NODE_ENV=production                  browserify   -r ./src/lib/web-components/:dev-box-ui-web-components                                                                                                        -g [ loose-envify purge --NODE_ENV production ] -g uglifyify -p bundle-collapser/plugin | uglifyjs --compress=unused,dead_code --mangle -o build/dist/dev-box-ui/web-components.min.js
scripts.build:babel:src:release: npm run build:babel:src:web-components && npm run build:babel:src:react-components
scripts.build:all: npm run build:vendors-react:dev && npm run build:vendors-react:prod && npm run build:dev-box-ui-react-components:dist:dev && npm run build:dev-box-ui-react-components:dist:prod && npm run build:dev-box-ui-web-components:dist:dev && npm run build:dev-box-ui-web-components:dist:prod && npm run build:babel:src:release
scripts.clean: rimraf build/dist/vendors/* && rimraf build/dist/dev-box-ui/* && rimraf build/web-components/* && rimraf build/react-components/*
scripts.dist: cp -rf package.json build && cp -rf README.md build && cd build && npm publish && rimraf package.json && rimraf README.md
